key_points: Chris Cuomo is expected to return to his CNN slot despite ethical concerns.
His role in advising his brother, Governor Andrew Cuomo during a political crisis has raised questions.
Media watchdogs and others call for Chris Cuomo to step down or be fired.
Northeastern journalism experts believe Cuomo and CNN management share blame for blurred personal and professional lines.
Chris Cuomo’s job seems secure for now, but the situation is evolving.
He was involved in crafting public statements for Governor Cuomo responding to harassment charges.
Washington Post media critic argues CNN should commission a report on Chris Cuomo's involvement.
Chris Cuomo acknowledged his mistake and apologized on air.
Critics argue that Chris Cuomo interviewing his brother on his show was inappropriate.
Female viewership of Cuomo Prime Time has declined since the NY attorney general’s investigation.
